title: Bankman-Fried Takes the Stand With a Great Focus on Relying on Counsel and Legal Advice
description: The former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried testified Thursday without jurors present. Bankman-Fried was questioned by his attorney, Mark Cohen, before the judge. He described FTX senior staff using encrypted messaging, discussed obtaining Alameda’s bank account, and talked about business operations with former general counsel members. Much of the focus was on FTX’s former lawyers and […]

title: Investors Are Pricing-in the Spot Bitcoin ETF Approval: Expert
description:
